subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Amir Khan, the popular 140-pound champion from England, announced a deal with Oscar De La Hoya’s promotional company, Golden Boy Promotions, in a plan to raise Khan’s American profile.
snippet: Amir Khan, the popular 140-pound champion from England, announced a deal with Oscar De La Hoya’s promotional company, Golden Boy Promotions, in a plan to raise Khan’s American profile.
